Kuwaanu waa Aayadaha Qur'aanka oo Kitaab cad ah.
arabic: طسٓۚ تِلۡكَ ءَايَٰتُ ٱلۡقُرۡءَانِ وَكِتَابٖ مُّبِينٍ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: tta-seen til'ka āyātu al-qur'āni wakitābin mubīnin
